body:
So i was looking on my profile recently and i realized my cake day (1 year annaversary) was 4 days ago D: . So sorry if it is a bit late but here are a few words

Avicus is really kewl. thanks staff, devs, and the community to keep avicus up and running. This is by far my 2nd fav server. Love how it is so similar to OCN so it is easy to adapt to the gameplay <3. So keep it up Avicus because you guys r kewl.

If your wondering why im inactive, i have been cramming for finals so ya and kinda got bored at MC

Fun Facts:

My cake day for the Overcast is 3 days after i joined Avicus
I joined Avicus a year and 3 days after Overcast

so um fire away the questions if you would like! and once again thanks avicus for everything <3

title: 1st Cake Day :D [AMA]

replies.body:
i choose...

or



but in all seriousness, the 2 servers are very close. OCN is my first (no h8 pls i wuv avicus) but avicus is the 2nd server i really play on. Both communites and networks are almost equally match with avicus being very super really close.

I still love avicus becaus the forum community is outstanding :D

replies.body:
positon? well usually im the guy who likes to rush and really dont care about my stats. I usually go up in the front lines and survive. sometimes i snipe people 

Well, as an OCN player, i am deeply ashamed of the people who did it. Not because of their misconduct but because they give OCN a bad name.

Preferably bow because its easy to use when you have a computer that gets on avg 10-30 fps

Dont really no the dev but hope he is good!

About that umm. Well yes in general but sadly i fractured my foot recently in a basket ball game and have to wear a cast over winter break so i cant walk in the snow with my cousins :(

well thanks :)
